Introduction

Triple7, also stylized as Triple Seven and 777, is a seven-member co-ed group under GH Entertainment. The group is made up of the members of B.I.G and 3YE. They debuted on August 10, 2021 with the song “PRESENTE“.

The group has been inactive since July 2022. As 3YE disbanded on November 15, 2024, the group is assumed to have disbanded.
